text: This list of universities in Ankara lists the universities within the city limits of Ankara == Public universities == Tree of Science", Middle East Technical University Faculty of Languages, History and Geography, Ankara University {| class="wikitable" !Name !Year of foundation |- |Gazi University |1926 |- |Ankara University |1946 |- |Middle East Technical University |1956 |- |Social Sciences University of Ankara |2013 |- |Hacettepe University |1967 |- |Ankara Yıldırım Beyazıt University |2010 |- |Ankara Haci Bayram Veli University |2018 |} == Private universities == {| class="wikitable" !Name !Year of foundation |- |Bilkent University |1984 |- |Başkent University |1994 |- |Atılım University |1996 |- |Çankaya University |1999 |- |Ufuk University |1999 |- |TOBB University of Economics and Technology |2003 |- |TED University |2009 |} == Former universities == {| class="wikitable" !Name !Year of foundation !Shutdown !Type |- |İpek University |2011 |2016 |Private |- |Turgut Özal University |2009 |2016 |Private |} == See also == * List of universities in Istanbul * List of universities in İzmir * List of universities in Turkey * Education in Turkey == References == Category:Ankara-related lists Category:Universities and colleges in Ankara Category:Turkey education-related lists Category:Turkey-related lists
